Each dose contain 15 mcg hemagglutinin antigen ( HA ) .Follow-up visit schedule 28 day dose day 208+/- 14 day blood work . The day administration first vaccine dose count day 0 . At visit , blood collect assess immunogenicity . Research participant give diary card record symptoms 28 day . They ask bring diary back next visit . Other vaccine-related adverse event also collect retrospective chart review .
